title: trouble logging in
body: cant login to client, all i get is "unable to connect to authentication service"  anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body: It sounds like your network isn't able to get a signal through to our login servers if that's the message you're seeing. Check to make sure your ports are open and there's nothing blocking your network from reaching us by following the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). If that doesn't help, shoot some of your network logs over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for some more in-depth troubleshooting.
